titles.title: To amend the Nuclear Waste Policy Act of 1982, and for other purposes.
To amend the Nuclear Waste Policy Act of 1982, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Natural Resources, Armed Services, the Budget, and Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
